statsAutres.cImmune: to blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

features.description: You are dormant until a creature moves within 10 ft. of you. You may then activate and use Rockfall. You remain active for up to one minute.

features.name: Rockfall
features.description: Save: DC 11 vs DEX, a 20 ft. by 10 ft. line from self in a fixed direction, all target. Hit: 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. Miss: half damage.

features.name: Subtle Vibrations
features.description: When a creature moves within 10 ft. of you, you may use Rockfall against that creature.
